version_description:
- Updated 3D Touch support: force press on the Splitwise icon to quickly add a bill with your most frequent contacts.
- We added a "report this friend" link to friend settings, so you can immediately get in touch with Splitwise support to help you resolve any issues.
- Fixed: Multi-currency users, you were sometimes seeing your USD balance in the Widget rather than your default currency balance. We're now respecting your default currency there.
- Fixed: Receipts uploaded via the Camera were sometimes rotated from landscape to portrait. Now Splitwise will leave your images alone.

We're hiring! Come help us end money stress; we can't wait to meet you: https://www.splitwise.com/jobs

- Added a group "whiteboard" under the "More" menu. Use the whiteboard to keep track of useful shared information, like your landlord's contact info or your hotel confirmation number.
- You can now restore your avatar to the default. We get it, it's a cute picture :)
- Fixed: A sync bug that resulted in erroneous "expense updated" notifications being sent to affected users' friends.
- Fixed: A bug that caused the keyboard not to appear on the "Enter passcode" screen, essentially preventing affected users from accessing the app.    

P.S. We're hiring! Come help us end money stress, we can't wait to meet you: https://www.splitwise.com/jobs

- Starting today users outside the US can invite friends to Splitwise via phone number*. We now load phone numbers from Contacts as well as emails.
- Fixed: We patched the Venmo / PayPal settle up paths to prevent you from sending money to invalid email addresses.
- Fixed: We’re now working with a professional translation service; they edited all our existing translations to perfect them.
* Apologies to users in the UAE and France, we’re not able to let you send phone invites at this time.
Splitwise is hiring! Come help us make sharing easy, we can’t wait to meet you: https://www.splitwise.com/jobs

- Pro users, you can now convert all expenses in a group to your default currency. To perform the conversion open your group and tap the “More” button. Splitwise will use the standard exchange rate of the day.
- We enabled auto-categorization of bills during editing: if you change an expense description from “retn” to “rent” the bill will now automatically be assigned the “rent” category.
- Fixed: An unacceptable lag when launching the “add bill” form.
- Fixed: An insta-crash affecting users who have added bills with someone who uses the lion emoji in their Splitwise username. Seriously.
- Fixed: A bug that prevented users from settling up via PayPal on the group screen.

We completely redesigned the app. Highlights include:

- A beautiful, modern interface
- Cover photos for groups
- Lightweight budgeting tools (spending by category, group spending totals, export to CSV)
- Significant performance improvements

Additionally, we're thrilled to announce our premium service Splitwise Pro. Upgrade to unlock:

- Receipt scanning with itemization (OCR)
- Currency conversion
- Expense search
- Charts
- Default splits for groups (eg. always 60% 40%)
- An ad-free experience

You can upgrade to Splitwise Pro by visiting the Account tab.

Our mission is to protect your relationships from money stress. If you have feedback on how we're doing or need assistance, please email hello@splitwise.com to get in touch. We'd love to hear from you.
